documentation.short: The Active Message layer for the CC2420 radio with timesync support.
CounterToLocalTimeC converts a 32-bit LocalTime to a Counter.
Provide current time via the LocalTime<TMilli> interface.
documentation.long:
Provide current time via the LocalTime<TMilli> interface.
@author David Gay

documentation.short: The Active Message layer on the Telos platform.
The virtualized active message send abstraction.
Counter32khz32C provides at 32-bit counter at 32768 ticks per second.
